item.title: Mentioned by Western Producer (subscription)
item.description:
Blake Richards upward bound?
Don't count out Alberta MP Blake Richards, a two term Wild Rose MP with a reputation on the committee as one of the Conservative partisan pit bulls but also an MP who competently chaired a special committee on cooperatives that produced a report leading ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cochrane Times
item.description:
Record-breaking charity game
“We've got a really great crowd out here this year and it's a great cause, we're thrilled to have so many people out,” said Blake Richards, Wild Rose MP and co-host of the event. “They're in need of money more than ever so I think Alberta has pulled together ...

item.title: Mentioned by Airdrie City View
item.description:
Hockey challenge is a great event
We want to congratulate Wild Rose MP Blake Richards and everyone who was involved in organizing the fifth annual Rocky Mountain Hockey Challenge for its success. (See story on page 22). After having to reschedule from June to August and relocate from ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cochrane Eagle
item.description:
Hockey Challenge a go
Wild Rose MP Blake Richards will finally hit the ice for his fifth annual Rocky Mountain Hockey Challenge Aug. 18, after the charity event was postponed due to the flooding emergency in Southern Alberta. The delay, however, has not had a negative impact ...

item.title: Mentioned by Cochrane Times
item.description:
Free tickets for first responders
First responders and their families will receive free tickets to MP Blake Richards' fifth annual Rocky Mountain Hockey Challenge, Richards announced July 26. “As we were reminded during the recent flooding, the men and women who serve our communities ...

item.title: Mentioned by Yorkton This Week
item.description:
New anti-mask law pointless and annoying
As Parliament broke for the summer, one of the laws that received Royal assent was Alberta MP Blake Richards' private member's bill C-309 making it a crime to wear a mask during a riot or unlawful assembly. Richards said he is proud to have identified a ...
